languages.text: "Губернаторы. Командоры. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}. История полна примеров людей, пренебрегавших своим долгом перед {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} и искавших союзников не в тех местах".

traits.locale_text: "Губернаторы. Командоры. RogueTrader {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}. История полна примеров людей, пренебрегавших своим долгом перед {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} и искавших союзников не в тех местах".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."
languages.original_text: "Губернаторы. Командоры. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольные Торговцы{/g}. История полна примеров людей, пренебрегавших своим долгом перед {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотым Троном{/g} и искавших союзников не в тех местах".

traits.locale_text: "Governors. Commanders. Rogue Traders. History is full of examples of those in power who forget their duty to the Golden Throne and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “可能是总督、指挥官，甚至是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。在历史上，有很多人忽视了他们对{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的职责，将错误的人当成了盟友。”
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: “可能是总督、指挥官，甚至是{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。在历史上，有很多人忽视了他们对{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的职责，将错误的人当成了盟友。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. Rogue Traders. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the Golden Throne and seek allies in the wrong places."

languages.text: «Gobernadores. Comandantes. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. La historia está plagada de aquellos que reniegan de su deber hacia el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y buscan aliados que no les convienen».
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: «Gobernadores. Comandantes. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciantes Independientes{/g}. La historia está plagada de aquellos que reniegan de su deber hacia el {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} y buscan aliados que no les convienen».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「総督。司令官。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}。歴史は、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}への責務を怠り、間違った場所に仲間を求める人々で満ちている」
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: 「総督。司令官。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}。歴史は、{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}への責務を怠り、間違った場所に仲間を求める人々で満ちている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Gouverneure. Commander. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Die Geschichte ist voll von jenen, die ihre Pflicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} gegenüber vernachlässigen und die falschen Verbündeten wählen."
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneure. Commander. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}. Die Geschichte ist voll von jenen, die ihre Pflicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Thron{/g} gegenüber vernachlässigen und die falschen Verbündeten wählen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Des gouverneurs. Des commandants. Des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Ce ne serait pas la première fois de l'histoire que des personnes malavisées négligent leurs devoirs envers le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} et forment des alliances avec des indésirables. »
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: « Des gouverneurs. Des commandants. Des {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libres-marchands{/g}. Ce ne serait pas la première fois de l'histoire que des personnes malavisées négligent leurs devoirs envers le {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g} et forment des alliances avec des indésirables. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Vali olur. Komutan olur. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olur... Tarihte {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'a{/g} vazifesini unutup da yoldan çıkan çok."
languages.original_text: "Governors. Commanders. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Traders{/g}. History is full of those who neglect their duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g} and seek allies in the wrong places."

traits.locale_text: "Vali olur. Komutan olur. {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olur... Tarihte {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'a vazifesini unutup da yoldan çıkan çok."
